methods.name: <init>

params.name: delegateConstraint
params.comment:
the constraint to feed column data to. Provides
 editors for manipulating constraint values.

params.name: columnDataSource
params.comment: provides access to table data and. Must be non-null.

methods.javadoc:
{@inheritDoc}

This editor provides a panel containing a {@link TaskMonitorComponent} and the ability to reload the columns' data; if the delegate editor provides an inline editor, this wraps it, and switches between task view and the editor depending on the executing state of the data-load task. @see DataLoadingConstraintEditor#buildDelegateInlineEditor()
methods.name: buildInlineEditorComponent
methods.comment:
This editor provides a panel containing a TaskMonitorComponent and the ability
 to reload the columns' data; if the delegate editor provides an inline editor, this
 wraps it, and switches between task view and the editor depending on the executing
 state of the data-load task.

methods.javadoc:
Get the delegates' inline editor component
@return the inline editor for the delegate constraint
methods.name: buildDelegateInlineEditor
methods.comment: Get the delegates' inline editor component

return.comment: the inline editor for the delegate constraint

methods.javadoc:
Get the delegates' detail component
@return the detail editor for the delegate constraint
methods.name: buildDelegateDetailEditor

return.comment: the detail editor for the delegate constraint

methods.name: handleColumnDataValue
methods.comment:
A value has been read from the table (column); handle it in an
 editor-specific way.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value read from the table (column)

methods.javadoc: Notification that the column data-load has been completed.
methods.name: columnDataLoadComplete
methods.comment: Notification that the column data-load has been completed.

methods.javadoc: Notification that the column data-load was cancelled.
methods.name: columnDataLoadCancelled
methods.comment: Notification that the column data-load was cancelled.

methods.javadoc:
Request that any state maintained by the delegate editor pertaining to
 column data be cleared.
methods.name: clearColumnData
methods.comment:
Request that any state maintained by the delegate editor pertaining to
 column data be cleared.

methods.javadoc:
Reset the delegate editor to a known state
@see #reset()
methods.name: resetEditor
methods.comment: Reset the delegate editor to a known state

methods.javadoc:
Indicates the constraint has changed, and the user interface needs to be updated to reflect
 the new state.
methods.name: doUpdateEditorComponent
methods.comment:
Indicates the constraint has changed, and the user interface needs to be updated to reflect
 the new state.

name: DataLoadingConstraintEditor
comment:
Abstract base class for constraint editors that load all the data in a column in order to
 initialize themselves.
